Package javelin.controller.action.world.improvement

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildHighway
    Upgrades the work of BuildRoad.
    BuildInn
    Builds an Inn.
    BuildMine
    Builds a Mine.
    BuildRoad
    Builds a road.
    BuildTown
    Builds an empty Town.
    Deforestate
    Turns a Forest tile into a Hill or Plains, generating labor in the process.
